results.title: La Niña Has Ended, and El Niño May Be on the Way

results.title: Topol, Star of ‘Fiddler on the Roof’ Onscreen and Onstage, Dies at 87
results.abstract: Wide acclaim for his portrayal of Tevye helped make him, according to one newspaper, “Israel’s most famous export since the Jaffa orange.”

media.caption: Topol as Tevye in the movie version of “Fiddler on the Roof.” The character is a weary, tradition-bound Everyman who argues with God, bemoans his lot as the penurious father of five daughters and lives warily amid the pogroms of Czarist Russia.
media.copyright: United Archives/Hulton Archive, via Getty Images

results.title: When Trump Passes the MAGA Hat, His Aides Clutch Their Wallets
results.abstract: Unlike other recent presidents, Donald Trump has rarely received campaign donations from his top advisers. They offer a range of explanations.

media.caption: Some of former President Donald J. Trump’s advisers said their time working for him was worth more than any check they could afford to write. Others pointed to his personal wealth and his already brimming campaign coffers.

results.title: California Braces for More Heavy Snow and Rain
results.abstract: Two consecutive atmospheric rivers were expected to bring the threat of flooding to parts of the state, along with heavy snowfall at higher elevations.
